_header: The time of youth is to be spent
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1602
Subjects: advice; Henry VII; youth, folly of

BLAdd31922.First Lines: The tyme of youthe is to be spentbut vice in it shuld be for fent…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …Vertue it is then youth ffor to spendIn goode dysporttys whych it dothe fend
